bug.short_desc: AVC denial: systemd-resolve, unable to create /run/systemd/resolve/resolv.conf: Permission denied

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Fresh install of F24 XFCE spin (Fedora-Xfce-Live-x86_64-24-20160308.0.iso) install downloaded from http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/fedora/linux/development/24/Spins/
I have network, but no name resolution as /etc/resolv.conf is missing, broken symlink: /etc/resolv.conf -> ../run/systemd/resolve/resolv.conf
Journal shows:
Mar 08 12:10:06 f24alpha systemd-resolved[1847]: Could not create /run/systemd/resolve/resolv.conf: Permission denied Mar 08 12:10:06 f24alpha audit[1847]: AVC avc: denied { create } for pid=1847 comm="systemd-resolve" name=".#resolv.confDiAchG" scontext=system_u:system_r:init_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:net_conf_t:s0 tclass=file permissive=0
# sestatus SELinux status: enabled SELinuxfs mount: /sys/fs/selinux SELinux root directory: /etc/selinux Loaded policy name: targeted Current mode: enforcing Mode from config file: enforcing Policy MLS status: enabled Policy deny_unknown status: allowed Max kernel policy version: 30

commit b117cba9fbbf56428da7610f0f1e97036f122482 Author: Lukas Vrabec <lvrabec@redhat.com> Date: Thu Mar 10 11:29:45 2016 +0100
Label tcp port 5355 as llmnr-> Link-Local Multicast Name Resolution
commit 2fe649cdce0923b9d79f9a20617f7936ed8e7c4d Author: Lukas Vrabec <lvrabec@redhat.com> Date: Wed Mar 9 16:26:03 2016 +0100
Add support systemd-resolved.
